title: Inside the Parker - Still Believin' In A Season; Cards Owner's Got Serious Nerve; Kevin Youkalis and Nick Swisher Talk Protests, Negotiation Stalemate
itunes:title: Inside the Parker - Still Believin' In A Season; Cards Owner's Got Serious Nerve; Kevin Youkalis and Nick Swisher Talk Protests, Negotiation Stalemate
description:
This week on Inside the (Rob) Parker, Rob explains why he still believes there will be a season, why slashing the MLB Draft to five rounds felt weird, and why Cardinals owner Bill DeWitt, Jr. has some nerve to say MLB teams aren't profitable. Also, Fair or Foul over Torii Hunter's Boston racism accusations.

Former Red Sox All-Star Kevin Youkalis explains why he supports a petition to remove former Reds owner Marge Schott's name at his alma mater The University of Cincinnati and his take on the protests as a means for change. World Series champ Nick Swisher joins the pod to discuss the latest on labor negotiations and how many games is enough to have a season. Click here to subscribe and download all of the latest Inside the Parker podcasts!!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
